pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation of Mean Costs in Censored Data // Implementation of estimators for inferring the mean of censored cost data. Including the estimators BT from Bang and Tsiatis (2000) doi:10.1093/biomet/87.2.329 and ZT from Zhao and Tian (2001) doi:10.1111/j.0006-341X.2001.01002.x.
